pkgmetadata.longdescription: Continuous Time Markov Rate Modeling for Reliability Analysis // Emulation of an application originally created by Paul Pukite. Computer Aided Rate Modeling and Simulation. Jan Pukite and Paul Pukite, (1998, ISBN 978-0-7803-3482), William J. Stewart, (1994, ISBN: 0-691-03699-3).
